themes: comparison to Houston airport arts program
value of showcasing national and international artists
acknowledgment of support for local artists
key_phrases: trying to focus on highlighting Austin's fine artists over national/regional artists is provincial and backwards thinking
The City had an airport arts program in partnership with local museums/fine arts organizations
The fine art ... was comprised of artists from across the U.S. and the world
I do appreciate supporting local artists
barriers_identified: provincial focus on local artists limits exposure to broader artistic excellence
solutions_proposed: broaden selection to include national and international artists
